text: I love this place. One of the few places where the price includes tax. Good people and amazing food. Small menu though but its worth it.
Not the prettiest place. But the koobedeh is the best I had in Toronto.Very tasty.

This is a small and cozy Persian/Iranian Kebab place on Yonge. I've been to this place several times and it's always been a pleasure grabbing a quick bite here.  This isn't a "fancy" restaurant and the decor is quite simple but with a lot of character, reminiscent of old Kebabb places in Tehran.  The food is tasty, the service is friendly and genuine and the prices are very reasonable.
My favorite persian restaurant in the city! Great food, great service, and great prices!
